projects.title: Video app
projects.description: Video app that lets the users keep their favourite videos from all the different sites in one place by pasting the link or the video's Id. Click the 'Load demo videos button' to see the example data

projects.title: Songify!
projects.description: Songify is a small, fully responsive music-player app preloaded with demo songs. User can change song by clicking the previous and next buttons or selecting the song from the expandable list, adjust volume and rewind the track by dragging or clicking on the track progress bar.

projects.title: Customizable pomodoro timer (work in progress)
projects.description: A little app that helps manage time and tasks. Users can customize settings and add their tasks
